quotes.text: Take a breath
How are you today?
What if you died today?
Remember that you're making memories right now
This is a moment in your life
Do you like where this is going?

Notice your nose.
What else are you ignoring?
Why are you here?
If this was a dream, would you know?
Are you conscious of your breath?
A moment of calm
The rest of your life starts now
What's in-between thoughts?
May this brighten your life
The moment is you
The internal compass is the only one you can rely on
You are reading these words right now
The reality of the situation is subjective
Take a moment
This phone is temporary
We are connected through these words
Are you dreaming?
You can always return to breathing
It's okay to do it your own way.
You are in the moment
Take as long as you need
This is your best self right now
I love you anyway
There's no sin like life
